name: graphql-deep-dedup
description: This repo contains source code and test harness of a custom [Apollo-Link](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/link/) library for GraphQL deduplication.

scripts.prepush: test -z "$(git status --porcelain)" || (echo "Respository is dirty."; exit 1) && npm run lint
scripts.printDir: npm run clean && tree -v --charset utf-8 -I node_modules
